questiontext.text:
Remplissez le tableau suivant :

Base Verbale Prétérit Participe passé Traduction
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%ring~%100%ring} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%rang~%100%rang} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%rung~%100%rung} sonner
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%let~%100%let} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%let~%100%let} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%let~%100%let} laisser
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%know~%100%know} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%knew~%100%knew} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%known~%100%known} savoir
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%stand~%100%stand} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%stood~%100%stood} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%stood~%100%stood} se tenir debout
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%hurt~%100%hurt} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%hurt~%100%hurt} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%hurt~%100%hurt} faire mal
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%sting~%100%sting} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%stung~%100%stung} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%stung~%100%stung} piquer
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%teach~%100%teach} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%taught~%100%taught} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%taught~%100%taught} enseigner
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%sleep~%100%sleep} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%slept~%100%slept} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%slept~%100%slept} dormir
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%make~%100%make} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%made~%100%made} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%made~%100%made} fabriquer
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%quit~%100%quit} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%quit~%100%quit} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%quit~%100%quit} arrêter
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%begin~%100%begin} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%began~%100%began} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%begun~%100%begun} commencer
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%do~%100%do} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%did~%100%did} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%done~%100%done} faire (auxiliaire)
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%shrink~%100%shrink} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%shrank~%100%shrank} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%shrunk~%100%shrunk} rétrécir
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%drink~%100%drink} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%drank~%100%drank} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%drunk~%100%drunk} boire
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%feed~%100%feed} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%fed~%100%fed} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%fed~%100%fed} nourrir
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%write~%100%write} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%wrote~%100%wrote} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%written~%100%written} écrire
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%speed~%100%speed} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%sped~%100%sped} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%sped~%100%sped} aller très/trop vite
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%see~%100%see} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%saw~%100%saw} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%seen~%100%seen} voir
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%shut~%100%shut} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%shut~%100%shut} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%shut~%100%shut} fermer
{1:SHORTANSWER:%100%breed~%100%breed} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%bred~%100%bred} {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%bred~%100%bred} élever

feed fed fed nourrir
